ItemDesc: In the next battle after use, Scare Box will hide on a random unit and explode at the start of the turn, dealing massive DMG.
ItemBGDesc: Pure terror requires only the most basic processing. When you already know I want to scare you but I still manage to scare you, then that's skill.\n\n"Aha! The fact remains, jump scares will always be the ace up the sleeve in the realm of horror."
